Why Balance Matters

At FIREandLife, we believe the path to FI should be balanced with joy and purpose today.

Because:
1. Life still happens on the way to FI.
2. Deprivation isn’t sustainable—or healthy.
3. If you can’t enjoy life now, you won’t later.
4. The real goal isn’t saving the most money—it’s living intentionally.
